scripts.start: yarn; concurrently -k "yarn run docs && ts-node --fast index.ts" "cd app && yarn start"
scripts.dev: yarn; yarn run docs; ts-node --inspect index.ts
scripts.debug: yarn; yarn run build; node --inspect-brk --trace-deprecation dist/index.js
scripts.test:debug: yarn run pretest; env NODE_ENV=test SECRET=secret MONGO_HOST=localhost MONGO_PORT=37017 MONGO_DB=test node --debug-brk --trace-deprecation node_modules/.bin/jest --watch --runInBand --testRegex '(/__tests__/.*|\.(test|spec))\.(js)$' dist; docker stop mongo_test; docker rm mongo_test
scripts.test:debug:inspector: yarn run pretest; env NODE_ENV=test SECRET=secret MONGO_HOST=localhost MONGO_PORT=37017 MONGO_DB=test node --inspect-brk --trace-deprecation node_modules/.bin/jest --watch --runInBand --testRegex '(/__tests__/.*|\.(test|spec))\.(js)$' dist; docker stop mongo_test; docker rm mongo_test
scripts.prebuild: yarn; rimraf dist; yarn run docs
scripts.build: tsc -p .; cp schema/schema.gql dist/schema; cp -R docs dist
scripts.db:clean: yarn run db:stop; yarn run db:destroy; yarn run db:create
scripts.test: env SLEEP_TIME=0 NODE_ENV=test SECRET=secret MONGO_HOST=localhost MONGO_PORT=37017 MONGO_DB=test jest --coverage
scripts.posttest: docker stop mongo_test; docker rm mongo_test
scripts.test:watch: yarn run pretest; env SLEEP_TIME=0 NODE_ENV=test SECRET=secret MONGO_HOST=localhost MONGO_PORT=37017 MONGO_DB=test jest --watch --bail; docker stop mongo_test; docker rm mongo_test
scripts.test:watch:coverage: yarn run pretest; env SLEEP_TIME=0 NODE_ENV=test SECRET=secret MONGO_HOST=localhost MONGO_PORT=37017 MONGO_DB=test jest --coverage --watch --bail; docker stop mongo_test; docker rm mongo_test
